mapper.insert: insert into EVENT_TB (nm, des, photo, photo_alt, mft, setl_methd_cd, stpt_dd, expi_dd, early_end_stus, ds_rate) values (#{nm}, #{des}, #{photo}, #{photo_alt}, #{mft}, #{setl_methd_cd}, #{stpt_dd}, #{expi_dd}, #{early_end_stus}, #{ds_rate});
mapper.select: select * from EVENT_TB ORDER BY stpt_dd DESC
mapper.update: update EVENT_TB set nm = #{nm}, des = #{des}, photo = #{photo}, photo_alt = #{photo_alt}, mft = #{mft}, setl_methd_cd = #{setl_methd_cd}, stpt_dd = #{stpt_dd}, expi_dd = #{expi_dd}, early_end_stus = #{early_end_stus}, ds_rate = #{ds_rate} where event_id = #{event_id}
